# sip-core

[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/sip-core.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/sip-core)
[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/sip-core.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/sip-core)

-----
Core elements of the SIP protocol (RFC 3261)

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [License](#license)

## Installation

```console
pip install sip-core
```
